snippet: The killing of Aslan Usoyan, an ethnic Kurd from Georgia known as Grandpa Hassan, may signal a return to the gangland violence of two decades ago.
abstract: Aslan Usoyan, ethnic Kurd from Georgia and underworld kingpin known as Grandpa Hassan, is shot dead in downtown Moscow; contract killing may signal return to gangland violence of Russia in 1990s.
lead_paragraph: The killing of Aslan Usoyan, an ethnic Kurd from Georgia known as Grandpa Hassan, may signal a return to the gangland violence of two decades ago.

headline.seo: Kingpin of Russian Underworld Is Fatally Shot
headline.main: Russian Gangster Fatally Shot on Downtown Moscow Street
headline.print_headline: Russian Gangster Fatally Shot On Downtown Moscow Street
